summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1728, for the improvement of West Stacy Street, in the City of Seattle, from a point about one hundred thirty (130) feet west of the west margin of Whatcom Avenue to a point about seven hundred fifty (750) feet west of the west margin of Whatcom Avenue, by constructing a plank roadway thereon twenty (20) feet in width, under Ordinance No. 18333 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
